lexUnit.name: stepson.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: son of one's husband or wife by a previous marriage

sentence.text: BENJAMIN Bream , stepson of the guitarist Julian Bream , was yesterday found guilty of stabbing a friend to death during an argument at a party .
